programme.title: This is BBC Two
programme.desc: Highlights of programmes on BBC Two.

programme.title: Mojo Swoptops
programme.desc: Cliffhanger. Felix the pig is stuck on a cliff ledge where not even Mojo's tops can reach him. They will need to be creative to get Bo up there and save that poor pig.

programme.title: Big Lizard
programme.desc: The Day We Met Ammon. Dad drops an essential gizmo in a hard-to-reach place. Big Lizard takes them on an underwater adventure to meet Ammon, the tentacled solution to their problem.

programme.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
programme.desc: The Over-Eager Eagle. Twinkle is unhappy with how easy questing has become since Cral the Eagle joined the heroes, offending the eagle just when they need him the most.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings - World Tour
programme.desc: Jungle Rhythm. The Lemmings organise a dance contest, where the first prize is a jar of YUMMY.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings - World Tour
programme.desc: The Grizming. A block containing Grizzy and the Lemmings' ancestors cracks during their fight.

programme.title: Pokémon Horizons - The Search for Laqua
programme.desc: Trending Terastallisation! Dance, Dance, Quaxly! Dot creates a plan for her Tera training aptitude test against Iono - but will it work.

programme.title: Bro's in Control
programme.desc: Queasy Spa. Max and Harvey host the Queasy Spa quiz, where the bros face some nauseating treatments! And can they pilot their own water jet packs in the Ultimate Memory Test.

programme.title: Apollo!
programme.desc: Apollo! Nitro pranks Apollo with fake influencer Aubry Devonne Keep, causing a big splash! The other Gladiators have fun behind the scenes and pranking the audience at Sheffield Arena.

programme.title: Blue Peter - Halloween Takeover
programme.desc: Halloween Takeover. It's our spookiest special yet, as we're in a creepy castle for Halloween.

programme.title: Newsround
programme.desc: 01/11/2025. Topical news magazine for children.

programme.title: Gardeners' World
programme.desc: It's an exciting week at Longmeadow as Monty makes a start on his new woodland garden.

programme.title: Scott of the Antarctic
programme.desc: Film drama. Determined to lead the first expedition to reach the South Pole, naval officer Scott assembles a team to try to beat a Norwegian attempt.

programme.title: Kelvin's Big Farming Adventure
programme.desc: The Fletchers face the realities of farming as Kelvin takes one of his lambs to the slaughter. An eye-opening visit to a local alpaca farm inspires Kelvin's next big idea.

programme.title: Hairy Bikers' Bakeation
programme.desc: The Hairy Bikers reach the last leg of their Bakeation. Their journey starts in San Sebastian, where they get stuck in to the local cuisine with pinchos.

programme.title: Rick Stein's Cornwall
programme.desc: Sea bass is served, and Rick's on the trail of Cornwall's greatest poet, Charles Causley.

programme.title: Nigel Slater's Simple Cooking
programme.desc: Nigel pairs spice with contrasting cooling flavours as he makes a chicken and chilli curry, spiced rice pudding and hot and spicy prawns.

programme.title: Alison Hammond's Florida Unpacked
programme.desc: Alison and Aidan feast on chicken and biscuits at a legendary Orlando diner, check out the heroic hustle at a fire station, and end the day with a sleepover in a haunted hotel.

programme.title: This Farming Life
programme.desc: Raymond tests the market for his cross-bred valais blacknose sheep. Lynn and Sandra go to their first ever auction to buy sheep and hens for the croft.

programme.title: Jane Eyre
programme.desc: Adaptation of Charlotte Bronte's classic tale set in the 1840s. Jane Eyre falls in love with Mr Rochester, unaware of the terrible secret that he is harbouring.

programme.title: Flog It!
programme.desc: Paul Martin and the team are in the Welsh town of Monmouth. Charlie Ross takes a trip down memory lane when he values some Babar books.

programme.title: MOTD Brackley Town v Notts County
programme.desc: Brackley Town take on Notts County in the first round of the FA Cup.

programme.title: Grand Tours of Scotland's Rivers
programme.desc: Paul explores the River Garry, which flows from the Grampian Mountains, restages the Battle of Killiecrankie and falls off a bridge before climbing the 'speckled hill'.

programme.title: TOTP2 - Girl Groups
programme.desc: Celebrating a gaggle of girls in performance at the BBC, from the Spice Girls to The Supremes, Labelle to TLC, and The Pointer Sisters to B*Witched.

programme.title: Girlbands Forever
programme.desc: It's the 90s, and girl bands All Saints, Eternal and the Spice Girls battle to become chart toppers. As girl band mania goes global, who will come out on top and at what cost.

programme.title: Girlbands Forever
programme.desc: In the new millennium, as the girl bands of the 90s split, new bands Atomic Kitten and Mis-Teeq vie for success. How will the next generation deal with life in the spotlight.

programme.title: All Saints at Radio 2 Live in Hyde Park 2018
programme.desc: From Never Ever to Pure Shores, the 90s hitmakers are back and bigger than ever.

programme.title: Bananarama at the BBC
programme.desc: A collection of Bananarama's biggest moments from the BBC archives, featuring many of the 25 Top 40 singles they released over their career.

programme.title: One Fine Morning
programme.desc: Single mother Sandra embarks on an affair with an old friend. Contains some strong language.

programme.title: Blue Lights
programme.desc: Grace and Sean bring in George for questioning, leading Morgan to take drastic measures. Contains strong language and some upsetting scenes.

programme.title: This is BBC Two
programme.desc: Highlights of programmes on BBC Two.

programme.title: Prayer and Reflection from...
programme.desc: Christian Pentecostal City Church, Cardiff. Join the City Church, Cardiff, for their International Sunday Service.

programme.title: Countryfile
programme.desc: Anita Rani and Sean Fletcher explore the magnificent Chatsworth Estate in Derbyshire - 35,000 acres of farmland, woodland and meadows, with the River Derwent running through its heart.

programme.title: Breakfast
programme.desc: The latest news, sport, business and weather from the BBC's Breakfast team.

programme.title: The Best of Weatherman Walking - Surprises of the South
programme.desc: Derek the weatherman reflects on some of his favourite walks from south Wales. In the Vale of Glamorgan, Derek is joined by Olympian Colin Jackson.

programme.title: Landward
programme.desc: It's tupping time on Cammy's farm, and Dougie meets some American Highland cattle.

programme.title: Saturday Kitchen Best Bites
programme.desc: A feast of food from Alexina Anatole, Gennaro Contaldo, Mary McCarntey and Donna Hay. Meanwhile, Rick Stein and Clive Myrie head out across the UK and abroad.

programme.title: Nadiya's British Food Adventure
programme.desc: Nadiya visits Yorkshire, where she lived for ten years. She meets Frank Powell, one of the area's last shore fisherman, and cooks him baked sea trout.

programme.title: The Great Food Guys
programme.desc: Chef Nick Nairn and Dougie Vipond focus on Asian fusion, cooking salt chilli squid with a Vietnamese dipping sauce with guests chef Kaori Simpson and actor Greg McHugh.

programme.title: Nigel Slater's Simple Suppers
programme.desc: Nigel Slater creates simple but delicious meals from ingredients that are often overlooked, including a lentil and chard stew.

programme.title: Whisky Galore!
programme.desc: Classic Ealing comedy about the mayhem that ensues when a whisky-laden ship runs aground off the coast of the Outer Hebrides during the Second World War.

programme.title: MOTD Eastleigh v Walsall
programme.desc: Eastleigh take on Walsall in the first round of the 2025/26 FA Cup.

programme.title: Alison Hammond's Florida Unpacked
programme.desc: Alison and Aidan step into an 80s-style Florida attraction, snack on quirky popcorn, and time-travel further for budget-friendly knights, horses and epic medieval fun.

programme.title: Flog It!
programme.desc: Antiques experts Anita Manning and Nick Davies put values on Reading's antiques and collectibles, including some American dolls and 19th-century French paperweights.

programme.title: MOTD - FA Cup Highlights
programme.desc: Jason Mohammad presents highlights from the first round of the FA Cup, including South Shields v Shrewsbury Town, Eastleigh against Walsall, and Port Vale v Maldon and Tiptree.

programme.title: World's Most Dangerous Roads
programme.desc: Zoe Lyons takes old friend Joe Wilkinson out of his comfort zone on a road trip across the eastern regions of Turkey.

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Motoring magazine. The team is on a road trip from Las Vegas to Los Angeles and on to Palm Springs, taking in racing circuits, airborne attacks and a race against the police.

programme.title: Mortimer & Whitehouse - Gone Fishing
programme.desc: Paul and Bob head to Wales to fish for sea trout as the sun sets in Carmarthenshire. How will they both fare in the pitch darkness.

programme.title: Daisy May and Charlie Cooper's NightWatch
programme.desc: Daisy May and Charlie Cooper stay overnight in a reportedly haunted 16th-century pub in the Midlands, but will they need a drink or two to make it to the morning.

programme.title: Later... with Jools Holland
programme.desc: With Florence + The Machine, New York musician Brian Jackson, soul singer Omar, Cardiff five-piece Panic Shack, classical pianist Víkingur Ólafsson and Londoner Baxter Dury.

programme.desc: Highlights of programmes on BBC Two.

programme.title: Mojo Swoptops
programme.desc: Cliffhanger. Felix the pig is stuck on a cliff ledge where not even Mojo's tops can reach him. They will need to be creative to get Bo up there and save that poor pig.

programme.title: Big Lizard
programme.desc: The Day We Met Ammon. Dad drops an essential gizmo in a hard-to-reach place. Big Lizard takes them on an underwater adventure to meet Ammon, the tentacled solution to their problem.

programme.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
programme.desc: The Over-Eager Eagle. Twinkle is unhappy with how easy questing has become since Cral the Eagle joined the heroes, offending the eagle just when they need him the most.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings - World Tour
programme.desc: Jungle Rhythm. The Lemmings organise a dance contest, where the first prize is a jar of YUMMY.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings - World Tour
programme.desc: The Grizming. A block containing Grizzy and the Lemmings' ancestors cracks during their fight.

programme.title: Pokémon Horizons - The Search for Laqua
programme.desc: Trending Terastallisation! Dance, Dance, Quaxly! Dot creates a plan for her Tera training aptitude test against Iono - but will it work.

programme.title: Bro's in Control
programme.desc: Queasy Spa. Max and Harvey host the Queasy Spa quiz, where the bros face some nauseating treatments! And can they pilot their own water jet packs in the Ultimate Memory Test.

programme.title: Apollo!
programme.desc: Apollo! Nitro pranks Apollo with fake influencer Aubry Devonne Keep, causing a big splash! The other Gladiators have fun behind the scenes and pranking the audience at Sheffield Arena.

programme.title: Blue Peter - Halloween Takeover
programme.desc: Halloween Takeover. It's our spookiest special yet, as we're in a creepy castle for Halloween.

programme.title: Newsround
programme.desc: 01/11/2025. Topical news magazine for children.

programme.title: Gardeners' World
programme.desc: It's an exciting week at Longmeadow as Monty makes a start on his new woodland garden.

programme.title: Scott of the Antarctic
programme.desc: Film drama. Determined to lead the first expedition to reach the South Pole, naval officer Scott assembles a team to try to beat a Norwegian attempt.

programme.title: Kelvin's Big Farming Adventure
programme.desc: The Fletchers face the realities of farming as Kelvin takes one of his lambs to the slaughter. An eye-opening visit to a local alpaca farm inspires Kelvin's next big idea.

programme.title: Hairy Bikers' Bakeation
programme.desc: The Hairy Bikers reach the last leg of their Bakeation. Their journey starts in San Sebastian, where they get stuck in to the local cuisine with pinchos.

programme.title: Rick Stein's Cornwall
programme.desc: Sea bass is served, and Rick's on the trail of Cornwall's greatest poet, Charles Causley.

programme.title: Nigel Slater's Simple Cooking
programme.desc: Nigel pairs spice with contrasting cooling flavours as he makes a chicken and chilli curry, spiced rice pudding and hot and spicy prawns.

programme.title: Alison Hammond's Florida Unpacked
programme.desc: Alison and Aidan feast on chicken and biscuits at a legendary Orlando diner, check out the heroic hustle at a fire station, and end the day with a sleepover in a haunted hotel.

programme.title: This Farming Life
programme.desc: Raymond tests the market for his cross-bred valais blacknose sheep. Lynn and Sandra go to their first ever auction to buy sheep and hens for the croft.

programme.title: Jane Eyre
programme.desc: Adaptation of Charlotte Bronte's classic tale set in the 1840s. Jane Eyre falls in love with Mr Rochester, unaware of the terrible secret that he is harbouring.

programme.title: Weatherman Walking - Carneddau and Skomer
programme.desc: Derek Brockway undertakes rambles in Wales. He explores a Roman road leading across the Carneddau Mountains, then views the puffins on Skomer Island.

programme.title: MOTD Brackley Town v Notts County
programme.desc: Brackley Town take on Notts County in the first round of the FA Cup.

programme.title: Grand Tours of Scotland's Rivers
programme.desc: Paul explores the River Garry, which flows from the Grampian Mountains, restages the Battle of Killiecrankie and falls off a bridge before climbing the 'speckled hill'.

programme.title: TOTP2 - Girl Groups
programme.desc: Celebrating a gaggle of girls in performance at the BBC, from the Spice Girls to The Supremes, Labelle to TLC, and The Pointer Sisters to B*Witched.

programme.title: Girlbands Forever
programme.desc: It's the 90s, and girl bands All Saints, Eternal and the Spice Girls battle to become chart toppers. As girl band mania goes global, who will come out on top and at what cost.

programme.title: Girlbands Forever
programme.desc: In the new millennium, as the girl bands of the 90s split, new bands Atomic Kitten and Mis-Teeq vie for success. How will the next generation deal with life in the spotlight.

programme.title: All Saints at Radio 2 Live in Hyde Park 2018
programme.desc: From Never Ever to Pure Shores, the 90s hitmakers are back and bigger than ever.

programme.title: Bananarama at the BBC
programme.desc: A collection of Bananarama's biggest moments from the BBC archives, featuring many of the 25 Top 40 singles they released over their career.

programme.title: One Fine Morning
programme.desc: Single mother Sandra embarks on an affair with an old friend. Contains some strong language.

programme.title: Blue Lights
programme.desc: Grace and Sean bring in George for questioning, leading Morgan to take drastic measures. Contains strong language and some upsetting scenes.

programme.title: This is BBC Two
programme.desc: Highlights of programmes on BBC Two.

programme.title: Prayer and Reflection from...
programme.desc: Christian Pentecostal City Church, Cardiff. Join the City Church, Cardiff, for their International Sunday Service.

programme.title: Countryfile
programme.desc: Anita Rani and Sean Fletcher explore the magnificent Chatsworth Estate in Derbyshire - 35,000 acres of farmland, woodland and meadows, with the River Derwent running through its heart.

programme.title: Breakfast
programme.desc: The latest news, sport, business and weather from the BBC's Breakfast team.

programme.title: The Best of Weatherman Walking - Surprises of the South
programme.desc: Derek the weatherman reflects on some of his favourite walks from south Wales. In the Vale of Glamorgan, Derek is joined by Olympian Colin Jackson.

programme.title: Landward
programme.desc: It's tupping time on Cammy's farm, and Dougie meets some American Highland cattle.

programme.title: Saturday Kitchen Best Bites
programme.desc: A feast of food from Alexina Anatole, Gennaro Contaldo, Mary McCarntey and Donna Hay. Meanwhile, Rick Stein and Clive Myrie head out across the UK and abroad.

programme.title: Nadiya's British Food Adventure
programme.desc: Nadiya visits Yorkshire, where she lived for ten years. She meets Frank Powell, one of the area's last shore fisherman, and cooks him baked sea trout.

programme.title: The Great Food Guys
programme.desc: Chef Nick Nairn and Dougie Vipond focus on Asian fusion, cooking salt chilli squid with a Vietnamese dipping sauce with guests chef Kaori Simpson and actor Greg McHugh.

programme.title: Nigel Slater's Simple Suppers
programme.desc: Nigel Slater creates simple but delicious meals from ingredients that are often overlooked, including a lentil and chard stew.

programme.title: Whisky Galore!
programme.desc: Classic Ealing comedy about the mayhem that ensues when a whisky-laden ship runs aground off the coast of the Outer Hebrides during the Second World War.

programme.title: MOTD Eastleigh v Walsall
programme.desc: Eastleigh take on Walsall in the first round of the 2025/26 FA Cup.

programme.title: Weatherman Walking - Menai Strait and Castell Coch
programme.desc: Derek Brockway undertakes rambles in Wales. He walks between the Britannia and Menai Suspension Bridges and treks between Caerphilly and Castell Coch.

programme.title: Flog It!
programme.desc: Antiques experts Anita Manning and Nick Davies put values on Reading's antiques and collectibles, including some American dolls and 19th-century French paperweights.

programme.title: MOTD - FA Cup Highlights
programme.desc: Jason Mohammad presents highlights from the first round of the FA Cup, including South Shields v Shrewsbury Town, Eastleigh against Walsall, and Port Vale v Maldon and Tiptree.

programme.title: World's Most Dangerous Roads
programme.desc: Zoe Lyons takes old friend Joe Wilkinson out of his comfort zone on a road trip across the eastern regions of Turkey.

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Motoring magazine. The team is on a road trip from Las Vegas to Los Angeles and on to Palm Springs, taking in racing circuits, airborne attacks and a race against the police.

programme.title: Mortimer & Whitehouse - Gone Fishing
programme.desc: Paul and Bob head to Wales to fish for sea trout as the sun sets in Carmarthenshire. How will they both fare in the pitch darkness.

programme.title: Daisy May and Charlie Cooper's NightWatch
programme.desc: Daisy May and Charlie Cooper stay overnight in a reportedly haunted 16th-century pub in the Midlands, but will they need a drink or two to make it to the morning.

programme.title: Later... with Jools Holland
programme.desc: With Florence + The Machine, New York musician Brian Jackson, soul singer Omar, Cardiff five-piece Panic Shack, classical pianist Víkingur Ólafsson and Londoner Baxter Dury.

programme.title: Pequeños en la naturaleza
programme.desc:
Refugio de los bebés animales
Una travesía explora los nidos, cuevas y escondites que los animales construyen para ofrecer espacios seguros a sus familias entre selvas, montañas e incluso cerca de los humanos.

programme.title: Exploración planeta Tierra con Dylan Dreyer
programme.desc:
Inviernos salvajes
El majestuoso pingüino emperador demuestra su fortaleza al ser capaz de sobrevivir en medio del clima más frío del planeta y convierte el invierno en un escenario de vida y resistencia.

programme.title: Harlem Globetrotters: Ganando con la comunidad
programme.desc:
Amor fraterno
Speedy invita a Thunder y Bulldog a su ciudad natal para apoyar a un barbero que ayuda a personas sin hogar. Jet y el entrenador Lou cuentan la historia de los legendarios Washington Generals.

programme.title: El viajero con Josh Garcia
programme.desc:
Impresionado por Maui
En Maui, Hawái, se inicia una aventura para conocer cuál es el plato tradicional de luau. Una práctica de surf en Honolua Bay, una visita a una plantación de piñas y una clase de ukelele.

programme.title: El reino animal de Mutual of Omaha: Protegiendo la naturaleza
programme.desc:
Salamandras gigantes
En el zoológico de St. Louis, Peter y Rae ayudan a preservar a la salamandra gigante de Ozark, donde varios científicos trabajan para criar más de 100 y devolverlas a la naturaleza.

programme.title: El reino animal de Mutual of Omaha: Protegiendo la naturaleza
programme.desc:
El depredador más poderoso del cielo
Peter y la Dra. Rae se conectan con el depredador más poderoso de América Central y del Sur, el águila harpía, ave nacional de Panamá con enormes garras y capaz de cazar a más de 100 especies.

Soluciones
El futuro ya está en marcha con ideas que transforman: ciudades que funcionan con energía solar, transporte eléctrico que no contamina, y corredores verdes que actúan como pulmones urbanos.

programme.title: Acércate a Rocío
programme.desc:
No sabe ser madre, pero sí quita maridos
Carlos encuentra en Dulce la atención y el cariño que Marlene le negaba. Ellas son hermanas, crecieron sin padre; ahora es una robamaridos y busca cobrar un seguro de su difunta madre.

programme.title: R.I.P.D.
programme.desc:
2013 г.
Policías persiguen a espíritus monstruosos que intentan escapar del juicio final escondiéndose entre los vivos. Cuando descubren un plan que podría acabar con toda la vida, ellos deben trabajar para restaurar el equilibrio cósmico.

programme.title: Dateline

John McAfee, pionero del antivirus informático, huye tras la misteriosa muerte de su vecino en el Caribe. Su desafío a la ley convirtió el crimen en un caso con repercusiones inimaginables.

programme.title: I, Frankenstein
programme.desc:
2014 г.
Doscientos años después de su creación, Adam, la criatura del Dr. Frankenstein, aún camina sobre la Tierra. Sin embargo, cuando se ve en medio de una guerra, Adam descubre que tiene la clave que podría destruir a la especie humana.

programme.title: Toronto Blue Jays / Los Angeles Dodgers
programme.desc: Découvrez les épreuves de la Major League Baseball (MLB). Elle regroupe deux ligues : la Ligue Nationale et la Ligue Américaine. La compétition qu'elle organise est le plus haut niveau du baseball aux Etats-Unis. La saison régulière se déroule d'avril à fin septembre, puis suivent les phases éliminatoires qui emmènent les vainqueurs de chaque Ligue aux World Series, qui est la finale se jouant au meilleur des 7 manches.

programme.desc: Retransmission d'un match amical d'équipes de rugby. Regardez vos équipes de rugby préférées se préparent pour la saison régulière.

programme.title: Ça se passe sur beIN SPORTS

programme.title: Tours / Poitiers
programme.desc: Implacable depuis l’ouverture du championnat, Tours avance en patron. Trois victoires nettes, aucun set concédé, et une démonstration face à Narbonne (3-0) pour asseoir son statut de favori. Porté par un Nik Mujanovic clinique (17 points, 78% de réussite) et une réception à 59%, le champion en titre impressionne par sa rigueur et sa puissance collective. Avec un effectif homogène et concentré, le TVB semble déjà lancé sur les mêmes rails que la saison passée. En face, Poitiers se présente regonflé par son premier succès de l’exercice à Cannes (0-3). Kevin Koprine, étincelant (15 points à 59%), a montré la voie à un groupe en quête de continuité. Mais le défi s’annonce colossal pour les hommes de Brice Donat : défier le champion en titre, à domicile, avec une récupération express et un effectif encore incertain. Tours veut poursuivre sa marche triomphale, Poitiers espère créer l’exploit, l’équilibre des forces, lui, semble déjà pencher lourdement d’un côté.

programme.title: Ça se passe sur beIN SPORTS
programme.desc: Ça se passe sur beIN SPORTS est un condensé de l'actualité sportive, des résultats et des meilleures images des derniers jours : football, tennis, basket, rugby, handball ou encore les sports US (NBA, MLB, NFL), toutes les compétitions sont passées en revue.

programme.title: Dijon / Brest
programme.desc: Retransmission d'un match de la Ligue Butagaz Energie, la plus haute division de handball professionnel féminin en France. Créé en 1952, ce championnat regroupe douze clubs professionnels qui s'affrontent pour obtenir le titre suprême de championnes de France. Le Metz Handball est l'équipe ayant le plus de titres dans l'histoire (23 titres) et un record de titres qui sera difficilement atteignable par les outsiders.

programme.title: Handball : avant
programme.desc: Juste avant une rencontre de handball, les dernières infos, les compositions des équipes et l'ambiance dans la salle.

programme.title: Le film de la saison de l'UBB : Union sacrée
programme.desc: Matthieu Jalibert et les Girondins ont vécu une saison mémorable. Après avoir triomphé en finale face aux Anglais de Northampton, ils ont soulevé la Champions Cup, marquant un tournant historique pour l'UBB. Mais leur rêve de doublé s'est brisé en finale du Top 14, où ils se sont inclinés face au Stade Toulousain sur le score de 39 à 33. Retour sur les temps forts d'une année riche en émotions et en exploits.

programme.title: This is Paris
programme.desc: This is Paris est le magazine dédié à toute l'actualité du Paris Saint-Germain : dernières news des vestiaires, reportages et interviews de ceux qui font le club, tout est passé en revue ainsi que les derniers résultats et les prochaines échéances à venir.

programme.title: Grand Prix de Riyad
programme.desc: Diffusion d'étapes du Global Champions Tour, une compétition internationale de saut d'obstacles réservée aux trente meilleurs cavaliers du classement mondial. La crème du hippisme se réunit lors de ces compétitions de saut d'obstacles qui se déroulent sur les plus réputés terrains de concours hippiques au monde. Créé en 2005, le Global Champions Tour a intégré la FEI sous forme de compétition officielle depuis 2008.

programme.title: Tennis : WTA Finals
programme.desc: Retransmission de matchs du célèbre tournoi de tennis des WTA Finals. C'est le dernier tournoi de la saison WTA, celui où seul les huit meilleures joueuses en simple et en double peuvent participer. Les joueuses sont divisées en deux groupes. Les deux premières de chaque groupe se retrouvent en demi-finales, et les vainqueurs rejoignent la finale qui rapporte 1500 points au classement WTA.

programme.title: Villarreal / Rayo Vallecano
programme.desc: Diffusion d'un match de LaLiga EA Sports, championnat d'Espagne de football, la plus haute compétition de football d'Espagne. Cette compétition professionnelle, placée sous la supervision de la Fédération espagnole de football, a été fondée en 1928 et s'appelle Primera Division jusqu'en 2008. Elle se nomme ensuite Liga BBVA jusqu'en 2016 puis LaLiga Santander de 2016 à 2023. A partir de 2023, elle se nomme LaLiga EA Sports pour des raisons de sponsoring.

programme.title: Darmstadt 98 / Arminia Bielefeld
programme.desc: Diffusion de matchs de Bundesliga 2, championnat antichambre de l'élite du football en Allemagne. Apparue en 1974 après une profonde réforme de l'organisation des divisions, la Bundesliga 2 offre un ticket d'accession immédiate à la prestigieuse Bundesliga aux deux clubs les mieux classés en fin de saison, ainsi qu'une relégation instantanée aux deux derniers de ce classement.

programme.desc: Pratite Saudijsku profesionalnu ligu, najvišu nogometnu ligu u ligaškom sustavu Saudijske Arabije. Osnovana je 1976. godine kao prva profesionalna nogometna liga Kraljevine Saudijske Arabije.

programme.title: Posveta zvijezdama
programme.desc: Boksači, nogometaši, košarkaši... Najbolji sportaši svih vremena, iz svih sportova. Na istom mjestu, u isto vrijeme, kako ih usporediti i kako napraviti vječne liste. Netko će probati ono o čemu se...

programme.title: Rally of Morocco, pregled
programme.desc: Uzbudljivi pregled jedne od najtežih i najpoznatijih rally utrka na svijetu. Emisija donosi najbolje trenutke, spektakularne vožnje kroz pustinju, izazove vozača i taktičke odluke koje su obilježile...

programme.title: LIVE: Nogomet - Portugalska liga: Guimaraes - Benfica
programme.desc: Prvi razred portugalskog nogometa, Primeira liga, osnovana je 1934. i broji 18 klubova. Najviše osvojenih naslova prvaka ima lisabonski gigant Benfica.

programme.title: Nogomet - Turska liga: Goztepe - Genclerbirligi
programme.desc: Turska Superliga je najviša profesionalna liga Turske u nogometu. Ova liga osnovana je 1957. godine i nalazi se pod upravom Turskog nogometnog saveza. U ligi se trenutno natječe 18 klubova, a...

programme.title: Košarka - Australska liga: Brisbane - Sydney
programme.desc: Australska košarkaška liga najjača je košarkaška liga na području Oceanije. Osnovana je 1979. godine i u njoj sudjeluje devet momčadi, osam iz Australije i jedna s Novog Zelanda.

programme.title: Uži izbor
programme.desc: Najbolji sportaši svih vremena, iz svih sportova. Na istom mjestu, u isto vrijeme, kako ih usporediti i kako napraviti vječne liste. Netko će probati ono o čemu se desetljećima priča...

programme.title: Nogomet - Bundesliga: Leipzig - Stuttgart
programme.desc: Nogometna Bundesliga najviši je rang natjecanja u Njemačkoj koja od 1963. godine i svog osnutka visokom kvalitetom igre oduševljava sve nogometne poklonike diljem svijeta.

programme.title: Nogomet: 2. Bundesliga: Hertha - Dynamo Dresden
programme.desc: Ako nije najjača onda je sigurno najbolje praćena druga nogometna liga na svijetu. Budite i vi kao pravi nogometni ljubitelj njemačke filozofije nogometa uz 2. Bundesligu na malim ekranima.

programme.title: Nogomet - Nizozemska liga: Feyenoord - Volendam
programme.desc: Eredivisie najviši je rang nogometnih natjecanja u Nizozemskoj. Kolijevka totalnog nogometa iz sezone u sezonu oduševljava nas neizvjesnim te efikasnim susretima.

programme.title: Košarka - Francuska liga: Asvel - Chalon
programme.desc: Francuska košarkaška liga LNB Pro A osnovana je 1921. godine. Kroz regularni dio i doigravanje 18 momčadi bori se za titulu prvaka Francuske.

programme.title: Nogomet - Bundesliga: Augsburg - Dortmund
programme.desc: Nogometna Bundesliga najviši je rang natjecanja u Njemačkoj koja od 1963. godine i svog osnutka visokom kvalitetom igre oduševljava sve nogometne poklonike diljem svijeta.

programme.desc: Vukli su jedni druge naprijed, uvijek je neki rivalitet izdizao sport na ljestvicu više. Najbolji sportaši svih vremena, iz svih sportova.

programme.title: Arena Sport 1x2
programme.desc: Arena Sport 1x2 prati uzbuđenja i promene rezultata na svim terenima širom planete. Pored direktnih prenosa, ovaj kanal je pravo mesto na kome prvi možete da saznate kada lopta uđe u mrežu ili prođe kroz mrežicu. Nesvakidašnji kanal na ovim prostorima, po uzoru na slične u Engleskoj, Francuskoj i Nemačkoj. Posebna grafika, stanje na tabelama, trenutna forma… Specijalne dnevne emisije, analize, poznati gosti. Tu su naravno direktni prenosi, multiprenosi utakmica koje počinju u isto vreme, atraktivne reprize… Ukoliko vas zanimaju najnoviji rezultati - Arena Sport 1x2 je pravo mesto za vas.

programme.title: Fudbal - Engleska liga: Multiprenos
programme.desc: Svakog avgusta 20 ekipa započinje lov na najcenjeniji trofej engleskog fudbala. Engleska Premier liga u formatu u kojem se danas igra osnovana je 1992. godine kao nastavak na Englesku ligu osnovanu davne 1888. Sezona traje do maja u dvokružnom sistemu gde svaka ekipa kroz sezonu odigra 38 utakmica. Prvi osvajač prvenstva je najtrofejniji engleski fudbalski klub, Mančester Junajted. Biti prvak Engleske je cilj kojem teži svaki igrač Premier lige.

programme.title: Fudbal - Ruska liga: Zenit - Lokomotiv
programme.desc: Ruska fudbalska liga kao naslednik Sovjetskog saveza beleži svoje takmičarske početke od 1936. godine iako se fudbal na području saveza igrao još od 1900ih. Najuspješnija ekipa za to vreme je Moskovski Spartak iako od početka drugog dela veka uspješniji su klubovi poput CSKA Moskve i Zenita iz St. Petersburga. Liga se sve do sezone 2012./2013. igrala u terminu proleće - jesen zbog dugačke zime te se od tada igra klasično evropski jesen - proleće. Velika finansijska ulaganja u ruske fudbalske klubove jako su približili ligu na Uefinoj lestvici koeficijenata prvih liga po snazi u Evropi.

programme.title: Fudbal - Švajcarska liga: Zurich - Lausanne
programme.desc: Švajcarska liga je jedna od najdugovječnijih liga u Evropi čija je prva sezona krenula još u 20. veku odnosno od 1897. godine. Liga se od 2003. igra po sistemu deset ekipa gde svaki igra sa svakim četiri utakmice po dve kući i dve u gostima. Poslednja ekipa nakon 36 kola napušta elitni rang švajvarskog fudbala i ispada u drugu švajcarsku ligu. Ekipa sa najviše titula je Grasshopper Club Zürich sa 27, od kojih su 19 u razdoblju profesionalizma. Novi milenijum je obeležio klub iz Bazela sa višestrukim uzastopnim titulama prvaka i jako dobrim rezultatima u Ligi šampiona.

programme.title: Fudbal - Francuska liga: Rennes - Strasbourg
programme.desc: Ligue 1 prva je francuska profesionalna fudbalska liga koja broji 20 ekipa u borbi za titulom prvaka Francuske. Osnovana je 1932. godine i smatra se jednom od najcenjenijih evropskih liga. Najtrofejniji klub s deset osvojenih titula je AS Sent Etjen ali Zeleni na novu titulu čekaju još od davne 1981. godine i vremena velikog Mišela Platinija. Susreti francuske lige nezaobilazan su događaj za svakog ljubitelja ove veličanstvene igre.

programme.title: Fudbal - Francuska liga: Lille - Angers
programme.desc: Ligue 1 prva je francuska profesionalna fudbalska liga koja broji 20 ekipa u borbi za titulom prvaka Francuske. programme.title: Američki fudbal: NFL RedZone
programme.desc: Emisija posvećena Nacionalnoj fudbalskoj ligi, najvećoj profesionalnoj ligi američkog fudbala koja je osnovana 1920. godine. Saznajte sve novitete o timovima, igračima i dešavanjima van terena.
